title: 【临时工搬运】中世纪的豪宅-[Venom's Contest]第一名作品
author: 筒子
txt_content:
中世纪的豪宅Medieval Mansion [Venom's Contest] - 1st Place!
[paper]作者原话[paper]This is my entry to Venom's 250 subscriber contest. I really wanted to join this contest when I noticed that there was one, so here is the result! 
It's a rather big medieval mansion, completely furnished, pretty detailed and with a nice landscape which was created in WorldPainter. The house itself took quite long to build, since there is almost no possibility to use WorldEdit. So all the small details must be built by hand, and that what takes so long. 

In this contest, the participants had to create a small building, maximum 30x30 blocks. In my opinion, this is a great contest subject where really the quality and not the size of the build counts :) 

Well, I hope you like how my house turned out! If you do like it, don't forget to drop a diamond to show me that you think my build is cool - it's totally free! :D 
Best of luck to all the participants! And also thankyou to Venom for hosting this cool contest ;) 
[book]简单翻译[book]是一个相当大的中世纪的豪宅,家具,很详细,不错的景观在WorldPainter创建。房子本身花了很长时间来建造,因为几乎没有使用WorldEdit的可能性。所以所有的小细节必须由手,和所需要这么长时间。
下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个是拿到了Venom's Contest比赛第一名的作品，整体是非常的不错的只是内饰我认为还是不够，如果能有我前面搬运的那几个别墅一般的内饰实力，那么这个小建筑就可以说是完美的了[painting]图片欣赏[painting]


[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
